title: The Republican National Convention 2020: Day Four | Doc Rivers, Steve Ballmer & Keke Palmer
itunes:title: The Republican National Convention 2020: Day Four | Doc Rivers, Steve Ballmer & Keke Palmer
description:
Trevor gives his take on the final day of the RNC, Doc Rivers and Steve Ballmer discuss the NBA players' strike, and Keke Palmer talks about hosting the MTV VMAs 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
